htmlform.formName: HMIS ACP 005b: Emergency ART Refill Form
htmlform.formDescription: HMIS ACP 005b: Emergency ART Refill Form

obs.answerLabels: MW- Migrant Workers, AGYW- Adoloscent Girls and Young Women, FF- Fisher Folk, LDT- Long Distance Truck Drivers, UF- Uniformed Forces, Preg- Pregnant, BF- Breastfeeding, IDU- Injectable Drug User, HEI- HIV Exposed Infant, OKP- Other KPs, TB- TB/HIV Client, RF- Refugee, ART- General ART Client, NIDU- Non IDU, OPP- Other PPs

1 - No signs,2 - Presumptive, 3C - TB Diagnosed - Clinically diagnosed, 3G - TB Diagnosed - Gene Xpert, 3L - TB Diagnosed - TB LAM,3M - TB Diagnosed -TB Microscopy, 3X - TB Diagnosed - Chest Xray, 3O - TB Diagnosed - Others, 4 - Tb Rx
H0- Never Initiated, H1- On INH, H2- Defaulted, H3- Taken off due to side effects, H4- Completed
N - Normal, MAM - Moderate Acute Malnutrition, SAM - Severe Acute Malnutrition, SAMO - Severe Acute Malnutrition with Oedema, O - Overweight/Obese
Active at parent facility, Active at temporary facility, Not followed up
